老款iPhone需更新軟件 避免週日不正常運作

03 Nov 2019, 10:34

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月03日訊】美國科技巨頭蘋果公司（Apple Inc.）發出的通告說，2012年或更早發布的部分iPhone、iPad機型需馬上更新軟件，否則可能在美東時間週日（11月3日）下午2點停止正常運作。
蘋果的網站公告稱，特別是，沒有安裝iOS 10.3.4版本的手機iPhone 5將不能連接需要正確日期和時間的在線服務，這意味著它們可能無法從App Store下載應用程序，或無法訪問電子郵件、以及上網瀏覽。
「如果您擁有iPhone 5，那麼在11月3日之前可以通過無線上網或連接計算機來更新設備軟件，以保證準確的GPS位置、並繼續使用依賴正確日期和時間的功能（包括App Store、iCloud、電子郵件和網頁瀏覽。」公告寫道。
但如果用戶錯過週日的截止日期，雖然無法通過iPhone設置菜單「下載更新」，但也可以繼續通過計算機進行手動更新。
iPhone 4s以及帶有蜂窩芯片的iPad Mini、iPad 2和iPad 3機型需要更新到iOS 9.3.6版本，否則它們不能保證準確的GPS位置。
蘋果網站說，由於「GPS時間轉換問題」，因此相關產品必須進行更新。據Ars Technica的報導，這一問題影響到許多不同的設備和系統製造商，與系統的「週數」時鐘達到極限並翻轉至000000000有關。
大多數iPhone用戶可能已經在設備上安裝了許多更新版本的軟件，他們也需要更新版本的iOS才能註冊一些Apple服務，甚至才能連接新的Apple硬件產品（如AirPods Pro）。
iOS 13版本於今年秋天發布，可以在2015年發布的iPhone 6S和iPhone 6S Plus以及更新的機型上運行。
因為仍有用戶使用2012年或更早版本的手機，因此蘋果已經發布了舊版iOS的更新版，保證這些設備可以正常工作並解決GPS翻轉問題。iOS 10.3.4和9.3.6已於7月發布。
「這一問題不會影響到iPod touch或其它只有Wi-Fi功能的iPad機型。它也不會影響更新的裝配iOS的設備。」蘋果說。
更新iOS的設置方法是：選擇設置>常規>軟件更新（ Settings > General > Software Update），就可以更新手機或平板電腦的操作系統了。
──轉自《大紀元》

Old iPhone needs to update software to avoid abnormal operation on Sunday

03 Nov 2019, 10:34

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 03, 2019] US technology giant Apple Inc. issued a notice saying that some iPhone and iPad models released in 2012 or earlier need to be updated immediately, otherwise it may be in the US East Time. Normal operation ceased at 2 pm on Sunday (November 3).
Apple's website announcement states that, in particular, iPhone 5 without the iOS 10.3.4 version will not be able to connect to online services that require the correct date and time, which means they may not be able to download apps from the App Store or access emails. And browsing the Internet.
"If you have an iPhone 5, you can update your device software via wireless Internet connection or a computer before November 3 to ensure accurate GPS location and continue to use features that depend on the correct date and time (including App Store, iCloud, Email and web browsing," the announcement wrote.
However, if the user misses the Sunday deadline, although it is not possible to download the update via the iPhone setup menu, it can continue to be manually updated via the computer.
iPhone 4s and iPad Mini, iPad 2 and iPad 3 models with cellular chips need to be updated to iOS version 9.3.6, otherwise they will not guarantee an accurate GPS position.
The Apple website said that due to the "GPS time conversion problem", related products must be updated. According to Ars Technica, this issue affects many different equipment and system manufacturers, and is related to the system's "week" clock reaching its limit and flipping to 000000000.
Most iPhone users may already have many newer versions of the software installed on their devices. They also need a newer version of iOS to sign up for some Apple services and even connect to new Apple hardware products (such as AirPods Pro).
The iOS 13 release was released this fall and can be run on the iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S Plus released in 2015 and newer models.
Because there are still users using mobile phones in 2012 or earlier, Apple has released an updated version of the old iOS to ensure that these devices work properly and solve the GPS flip problem. iOS 10.3.4 and 9.3.6 were released in July.
"This issue will not affect iPod touch or other Wi-Fi-only iPad models. It will not affect newer iOS devices," Apple said.
The way to update iOS is to update your phone or tablet's operating system by selecting Settings > General > Software Update.
